record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - July 17, 2007)

[Page: H7898]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislative days in which to revise and extend their remarks and include extraneous material on H.R. 3043, and that I may include tabular material on the same.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Wisconsin?
